original_text: For the law appoints men in their weakness as high priests, but the word of the oath, which came later than the law, appoints a Son who has been made perfect forever.
korean_text: 율법은 약점을 가진 사람들을 제사장으로 세웠거니와 율법 후에 하신 맹세의 말씀은 영원히 온전하게 되신 아들을 세우셨느니라

sentences.original_text: For the law appoints men in their weakness as high priests
but the word of the oath, which came later than the law
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 율법보다 뒤에 온 맹세의 말씀은

sentences.original_text: appoints a Son who has been made perfect forever
sentences.korean_translation: 영원히 온전하게 되신 한 아들을 세웁니다
